{{Infobox dungeon |name = Shoal Cave |image = [[File:Shoal Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Shoal Cave |tokens = 28,000 |location = On Route 135, North of Mossdeep City. }} '''Shoal Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 290,000 |- | Boss || 900,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Zubat * Golbat * Spheal * Tentacool * Magikarp * Wailmer * Snorunt (boss)

{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
